# Alice's message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details at this point, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to the right buyer.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,250,000. This is a substantial price point, but I'm confident you'll see the value in this investment. Let me know what you think. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,250,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,250,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
